name: Jakariya
title: Full-Stack Developer
description: I'm a skilled web developer with expertise in MERN stack. I'm passionate about creating efficient and user-friendly website and mobile applications.
longDescription1: I am a full-stack web developer specializing in custom website development and modern web application development for startups, entrepreneurs, and businesses worldwide. I build fast, secure, and scalable web solutions using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js), Laravel, and Next.js, ensuring clean architecture, responsive design, and optimized performance.
longDescription2: In addition to web development, I provide cross-platform mobile app development with Flutter, delivering high-performance Android and iOS apps that integrate seamlessly with backend systems. My services cover frontend development, backend development, API integration, e-commerce solutions, and SEO-friendly website design, all tailored to meet your specific business objectives.
longDescription3: With a proven track record of delivering successful projects for clients in the USA, UK, Canada, Australia, UAE, and Europe, I have worked with both small startups and large enterprises. I focus on writing clean, maintainable code, creating intuitive user interfaces, and delivering conversion-focused, search-optimized digital products. Whether you need a landing page, corporate website, or a complex web and mobile application, I help turn your vision into reality with result-driven development strategies.
